original_text: At one time, Ahab's wife Jezebel was killing many of the Lord's prophets. While she was doing this, Obadiah had kept 100 prophets safe. He had hidden them in two caves, with 50 prophets in each cave. He had also given them food and water.
korean_text: 이세벨이 여호와의 선지자들을 멸할 때에 오바댜가 선지자 백 명을 가지고 오십 명씩 굴에 숨기고 떡과 물을 먹였더라

sentences.original_text: At one time, Ahab's wife Jezebel
was killing many of the Lord's prophets.
While she was doing this, Obadiah
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 이런 일을 하는 동안, 오바댜는

sentences.original_text: He had hidden them in two caves,
He had also given them food and water.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또 그들에게 음식과 물을 주었다.
